item.text: Then the Lord spoke to Moses:

“On the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> of the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st> you are to <st data-num="06965" class="">set up</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

You are to <st data-num="07760" class="">place</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">in it</st> and <st data-num="05526" class="">shield</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> the special <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st>.

You are to <st data-num="0935" class="">bring in</st> the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st> and <st data-num="06186" class="">set out</st> the <st data-num="06187" class="">things that belong on</st> it;<n id="1" /> then you are to <st data-num="0935" class="">bring in</st> the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> and <st data-num="05927" class="">set up</st> its <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> for <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="04539" class="">curtain</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the large <st data-num="03595" class="">basin</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st> and the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">in it</st>.<n id="1" />

You are to <st data-num="07760">set up</st> the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> it and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="04539" class="">curtain</st> at the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>.

And <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>, and <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st> the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is in it, and <st data-num="06942" class="">sanctify</st> it and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">furnishings</st>, and it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st>.

Then you are to <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> with<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>; you are to <st data-num="06942" class="">sanctify</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, and it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.
You must also anoint the large basin and its pedestal, and you are to sanctify it.
“You are to bring Aaron and his sons to the entrance of the tent of meeting and wash them with water.

Then you are to <st data-num="03847" class="">clothe</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> and <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st> him and <st data-num="06942" class="">sanctify</st> him so that he may <st data-num="03547" class="">minister as</st> my <st data-num="03547" class="">priest</st>.

You are to <st data-num="07126" class="">bring</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="03847" class="">clothe</st> them with <st data-num="03801" class="">tunics</st>

and <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st> them just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> you <st data-num="04886" class="">anointed</st> their <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, so that they may <st data-num="03547" class="">minister as</st> my <st data-num="03547" class="">priests</st>; their <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">make</st> them a <st data-num="03550" class="">priesthood</st> that will <st data-num="05769" class="">continue</st> throughout their <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st>.”
This is what Moses did, according to all the Lord had commanded him—so he did.
So the tabernacle was set up on the first day of the first month, in the second year.

When <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">set up</st> the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> its <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">in place</st>, he <st data-num="07760" class="">set up</st> its <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> its <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st>, and <st data-num="06965" class="">set up</st> its <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st>.
Then he spread the tent over the tabernacle and put the covering of the tent over it, as the Lord had commanded him.

He <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st>, <st data-num="07760" class="">attached</st> the <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st>, and then <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st> <st data-num="05921 04605" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st>.
And he brought the ark into the tabernacle, hung the protecting curtain, and shielded the ark of the testimony from view, just as the Lord had commanded him.
And Moses put the table in the tent of meeting, on the north side of the tabernacle, outside the curtain.
And he set the bread in order on it before the Lord, just as the Lord had commanded him.
And he put the lampstand in the tent of meeting opposite the table, on the south side of the tabernacle.
Then he set up the lamps before the Lord, just as the Lord had commanded him.
And he put the gold altar in the tent of meeting in front of the curtain,
and he burned fragrant incense on it, just as the Lord had commanded him.
Then Moses put the curtain at the entrance to the tabernacle.
He also put the altar for the burnt offering by the entrance to the tabernacle, the tent of meeting, and offered on it the burnt offering and the meal offering, just as the Lord had commanded him.
Then he put the large basin between the tent of meeting and the altar and put water in it for washing.

<st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> and <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> would <st data-num="07364" class="">wash</st> their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> and their <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it.
Whenever they entered the tent of meeting, and whenever they approached the altar, they would wash, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
And he set up the courtyard around the tabernacle and the altar, and put the curtain at the gate of the courtyard. So Moses finished the work.
Then the cloud covered the tent of meeting, and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.
Moses was not able to enter the tent of meeting because the cloud settled on it and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.

But when the <st data-num="06051" class="">cloud</st> was <st data-num="05927" class="">lifted up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st> would <st data-num="05265" class="">set out</st><n id="2" /> on <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="04550" class="">journeys</st>;

but <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="06051" class="">cloud</st> was <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">lifted up</st>, then they would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05265" class="">journey</st> farther <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> it was <st data-num="05927" class="">lifted up</st>.<n id="1" />
For the cloud of the Lord was on the tabernacle by day, but fire would be on it at night, in plain view of all the house of Israel throughout all their journeys.
